article_title: IRS Seeks Public Comment On Controversial Obamacare 'Cadillac Tax'

article_metadata.description: In July of 2015, IRS issued Notice 2015-52 seeking comment on Obamacare and the Cadillac tax, including who may be liable for the tax, employer aggregation, allocation of tax and payment of the tax. Here are some of the highlights.
article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb

og.description: In July of 2015, IRS issued Notice 2015-52 seeking comment on Obamacare and the Cadillac tax, including who may be liable for the tax, employer aggregation, allocation of tax and payment of the tax. Here are some of the highlights.
